post.text: You don't want to miss this one: Join Hillary, President Obama, First Lady Michelle Obama, President Bill Clinton, and Chelsea Clinton live in Philly on the eve of Election Day.

comment.author: Anne
comment.text: You are cheating Hillary! It is wrong to get illegals to vote & letting prisoners vote & get your big fancy stars to show up & made sure the fans voted first for you in order to get into your Ralley...

replies.author: Skyler
replies.text: You're ignorant and your comment reeks of that ignorance. EDUCATE yourself !!
